sub_title: SVP & Managing Partner | Ecosystem, Strategy & Sustainability Leader |  Driving Growth,  Transformation and Talents
summary:
My leadership philosophy and experience, across multiple sectors and regions, is summed up by the expression “Connecting the Dots”: to bring value, impact and build ecosystems.  This leitmotif aligns exactly with my approach and contributions to steering boards, organizations, partnerships and stakeholder engagement.

•	Servant leadership: A passion for developing and investing in leaders wherever they might be
•	Keep learning: The opportunity to push new boundaries,learn and question the status quo thus bringing unique views and ideas.
•	Get out of my comfort zone and find the core - outline exactly what success looks like-: To motivate and influence others towards a common vision and strategy.  

In all these endeavours I seek to interrogate the space between the dots – i.e., the frequently contested space between innovation, sustainability and leadership in order to foster collaboration and alignment to a core purpose. 

In practical terms it translates to big-picture thinking and the ability to understand the key driving strategic issues and aligning the organization into “connecting the dots”.  

Leaders who care and understand purpose drive sustainable change. They cut through the noise, and are able to break down divisional silos, bridge communication gaps, and engage all stakeholders in building ecosystems and growth.  

This has been the trajectory of my career in both Executive and Independent NED positions and I look forward to continue nurturing leaders, fostering synergies and making sustainable impact.



Experience in ( Connecting the dots) :
- Empowering leaders.
- leading cross-functional/ regional teams to lead complex infrastructure projects and strategic partnerships implementation.
- emerging markets.
- angel investing and mentoring .

authors.headline: SVP & Managing Partner | Ecosystem, Strategy & Sustainability Leader |  Driving Growth,  Transformation and Talents
SVP & Managing Partner | Ecosystem, Strategy & Sustainability Leader |  Driving Growth,  Transformation and Talents

profile_positions.description:
IR, Sustainability, Strategy & Strategic partnership, External affairs- CEO Office

Developing sustainable ecosystems by engaging and building partnerships with strategic stakeholders and investors across Southern Europe, Africa and Latin America thus promoting impact and growth. 

Governments, shareholders and other stakeholders engagement ensuring strategic alignment with as Development Finance Institutions, Microfinance Investment Vehicles and many government ministries, e.g., the Government of the Netherlands, FCDO, French Development Agency (AFD) group, African Development Bank, The Development Bank of Southern Africa, European Commission (EU) etc. 

Steering our sustainability and impact mandate. 

Other areas of responsibility include Strategy, Public Relations and Sustainability:
•	Representing the Fund with governments (Ministries, Central Banks and others), supranational organizations and finance institutions
•	Building relationships with all stakeholders, negotiating strategic partnerships 
•	Increasing awareness of challenges and opportunities faced by emerging market players through advocacy and policy dialogues
•	Strengthening and promoting the Fund’s brand, including as Fund ambassador at international conferences focused on finance, infrastructure and sustainability
profile_positions.title: Senior VP Strategy and External affairs - CEO Office

profile_positions.description:
Provide strategy, transformation, sustainability and financing advisory services:
• Independent board, IC, committees and advisory positions
• Sustainability ( ESG and DEI) initiatives
• Partner at Impact Partners
profile_positions.title: Co Managing Partner

profile_positions.description:
Headed the strategy, growth and transformation of the customer/asset finance and leasing vendors programmes between Royal Philips and major European bank, responsible for EUR 75+Mio OIT (60+ Mios) P&L 
Major achievements in this portfolio included:
•	Led Joint venture team in the design, development and execution of performance plans which realised a 30% increase in Sales as well as establishing international best practice in Service and Operations thus boosting retention
•	Lead for complex Strategic Solutions projects and Financing in the region as well as Transformation/Customer Experience initiatives
profile_positions.title: Head of France, Iberia and Strategic Solutions Southern Europe and Africa | Healthtech & leasing

profile_positions.description:
Led strategy, talent, transformation and financing efforts:
• Organisational development and Business & processes Optimisation.
•  Change management and growth performance optimisation of sales & marketing talent.
• Advisory on Strategic partnerships, growth, M&A and financing in Infrastructure and technology ( Drones, AI, Fintech).
profile_positions.title: Managing Director | Asset&infrastructure finance and technology

profile_positions.description:
In this challenging and rewarding role, I established the first office of GE Capital in Africa with a brief to steer strategic growth and aircraft/engine leasing and financing across Sub-Saharan Africa (USD 3Bn Asset in Africa). 
Led geographically dispersed cross-functional team that provided full cycle innovative leasing and financing solutions
Championed the Regional Hub of the GE Women’s network, fostering and accelerating the recruitment and development of women leaders.

• Responsible for the region' strategy, P&L growth and leadership. 
• Customer Experience's full cycle including turn around.
• Corporate affairs.
